effect.name: Inner Shadow
effect.description:
Blurs the edges of the image and fills them with a color. You can offset the shadow.
Last Updated: 2022-11-22 12:37
effect.author: NaitorStudios (Originally Inner Glow from Looki)

parameter.name: Radius
parameter.description: Radius of the shadow in pixels.

parameter.name: Exponent
parameter.description: The higher, the sharper the shadow will be.
